entry.title: 'The Summer I Turned Pretty' movie—here's everything to know
entry.summary: The final chapter of Belly’s journey will be told with a feature film.

entry.title: Qwen3 and DeepSeek-V3.1 models now available fully managed on AWS
entry.summary: AWS continues to invest in being the best place to run open weight models with five new options that enhance model choice in Amazon Bedrock to further meet customers’ needs.

entry.title: Independent sellers move 5 billion products annually through Amazon’s network of global logistics, domestic freight, and bulk warehousing
entry.summary: Amazon launches new AI customs tools and expands its fulfillment offerings for Walmart, Shopify, and SHEIN, helping sellers simplify their supply chain and better serve customers across their channels

entry.title: 'Thursday Night Football' 2025 schedule: How to watch live on Prime Video
entry.summary: Prime Video’s fourth season of ‘Thursday Night Football’ is packed with divisional matchups and features two holiday showdowns.

entry.title: Everything you need to know about ‘Thursday Night Football’ on Prime Video
entry.summary: Find out who’s playing, how to watch, and who won each week. Plus, get all the latest ‘Thursday Night Football’ news from Prime Video.

entry.title: Submit a Media Inquiry | Blue Origin
entry.summary: If you’re a member of the press, please contact us at media@blueorigin.com with your inquiry and deadline.

entry.title: Gallery | Blue Origin
entry.summary: Images available for download. Please credit Blue Origin.

entry.title: Blue Origin Completes 35th New Shepard Mission | Blue Origin
entry.summary: Blue Origin successfully completed its 35th New Shepard flight and 15th payload mission today from Launch Site One in West Texas.

entry.title: Blue Alchemist Hits Major Milestone Toward Permanent and Sustainable Lunar Infrastructure | Blue Origin
entry.summary: Blue Origin's pioneering in-space resource utilization system, Blue Alchemist, has successfully completed its Critical Design Review, marking a transformative milestone toward humanity's permanent expansion beyond Earth.

entry.title: The Mission: Blue Origin’s Mars Telecommunications Orbiter | Blue Origin
entry.summary: Built upon our existing and affordable Blue Ring platform, our Mars Telecommunications Orbiter is ready to support NASA’s Mars mission in 2028.

entry.title: Blue Origin’s New Shepard Completes 34th Mission to Space | Blue Origin
entry.summary: Blue Origin successfully completed its 14th human spaceflight and the 34th flight for the New Shepard program.

entry.title: Entertainment
entry.summary: Stories about the latest apps and games, movies, TV shows, and music available from Amazon Prime Video, Amazon Music, and Kindle.

entry.title: AWS
entry.summary: If you're an inventor, you'll love being an Amazonian. From day one at Amazon, you'll take ownership of projects that have a direct impact on our customers.

entry.title: Small business
entry.summary: More than 60% of items sold in Amazon stores are from independent sellers, most of which are small and medium-sized businesses.

entry.title: Innovation at Amazon
entry.summary: Amazon is a company of builders. It's our job to make bold bets, and we get our energy from inventing on behalf of customers.

entry.title: Sustainability
entry.summary: Amazon puts our scale and inventive culture to work on sustainability and protecting the environment.

entry.title: Retail
entry.summary: More information about shopping on Amazon and our selection of products and services.
